title: Stockpile of personal protective equipment in hospital settings: Preparedness for influenza pandemics
text: According to this system, the total number of PPE is 10,528 N95 respirators (with exhalation valve), 8848 N95 respirators, 122,192 surgical masks, 21,280 goggles and gowns, 34,832 aprons, and 172,480 pairs of gloves
